Raetul is a merchant found in east Sophanem. He runs a store, which can only be accessed after several pages of dialogue, called Raetul and Co's Cloth Store. This store is marked with a wooden wheel on the minimap. He stocks items such as desert clothing, silk, and crafting tools. In the Icthlarin's Little Helper quest, players purchase linen from him for 30 coins. He is seen in a cutscene in Contact! as part of the High Priest's delegation.

The High Priest leads a delegation of Sophanites to parlay with Menaphos.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
10 January 2007
(update)

The NPC was renamed from "Linen Worker" to "Raetul".

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • During the quest, after the player has purchased the linen from him, he says "Thank you come again." This may be a quote from Apu off the TV show The Simpsons.
  • His examine info, "A dedicated follower of fashion", is a reference to the song by The Kinks.
  • If the potion is used on Raetul (to relieve him of the itching), he will unfortunately get some of the potion in his eye. Furthermore, the potion has no effect and Raetul furiously sends the player away.
  • During the cutscene, the character still uses his original name of "Linen worker"
